scripts.build-pqc-addon: npm run build-falcon-round3 && npm run build-dilithium-round3
scripts.clean-tsc: rimraf dist/ && rimraf bin/ && mkdir bin/
scripts.build-tsc: npm run clean-tsc && tsc && npm run copy-addon
scripts.createPackage: node ./buildTool/createPackageJson.js ./package.json ./dist/package.json && cd dist && npm i && cd ..
scripts.caxa: npm run build-tsc && npm run createPackage && npm run copy-mineBin && caxa -i ./dist -o ./bin/app  -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/index.js"
scripts.caxa-win: npm run build-tsc && npm run createPackage && npm run copy-mineBin-win && caxa -i ./dist -o ./bin/app.exe  -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/index.js"
